div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Testing Best Practices

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
AAA Pattern
‚Ä¢ Arrange: Set up test data
‚Ä¢ Act: Execute the behavior
‚Ä¢ Assert: Verify the outcome
‚Ä¢ Clear test structure

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Given-When-Then
‚Ä¢ Given: Initial context
‚Ä¢ When: Action performed
‚Ä¢ Then: Expected result
‚Ä¢ BDD-style clarity

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Test Naming
‚Ä¢ should_return_error_when_email_invalid
‚Ä¢ Descriptive method names
‚Ä¢ Business behavior focus
‚Ä¢ Self-documenting tests

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Test Anti-patterns to Avoid

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
‚ùå Ice Cream Cone
Too many E2E tests
Few unit tests
Slow feedback
High maintenance cost

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
‚ùå Testing Trophy Misuse
Overemphasis on integration
Neglecting unit tests
Complex test setup
Flaky test results

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
‚ùå No Testing Strategy
Manual testing only
No automation
High defect rate
Slow delivery

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Coverage and Quality Metrics

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Coverage Targets
‚Ä¢ Unit tests: > 90% line coverage
‚Ä¢ Integration tests: > 80% feature coverage
‚Ä¢ E2E tests: > 95% critical path coverage
‚Ä¢ Overall: > 80% code coverage

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Quality Metrics
‚Ä¢ Test execution time trends
‚Ä¢ Test failure rate analysis
‚Ä¢ Code coverage evolution
‚Ä¢ Test maintenance effort

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Test Execution Strategy

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Daily Development
./gradlew quickTest
‚Ä¢ Unit tests only
‚Ä¢ Fast feedback under 2 min
‚Ä¢ TDD cycle support

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Pre-Commit
./gradlew preCommitTest
‚Ä¢ Unit + Integration tests
‚Ä¢ Quality assurance under 5 min
‚Ä¢ CI/CD gate

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Pre-Release
./gradlew fullTest
‚Ä¢ All test types
‚Ä¢ Complete validation under 30 min
‚Ä¢ Release readiness

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Test Strategy Guidelines

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Fast Feedback Loop
‚Ä¢ Unit tests run in < 2 minutes
‚Ä¢ Integration tests in < 5 minutes
‚Ä¢ E2E tests in < 30 minutes
‚Ä¢ Fail fast on critical issues

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Test Isolation
‚Ä¢ Independent test execution
‚Ä¢ No shared state between tests
‚Ä¢ Clean setup/teardown
‚Ä¢ Deterministic results

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Test Maintainability
‚Ä¢ Clear test naming
‚Ä¢ DRY principle application
‚Ä¢ Page Object pattern for UI
‚Ä¢ Regular refactoring

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Testing Tools by Layer

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Unit Test Tools
‚Ä¢ JUnit 5: Test framework
‚Ä¢ Mockito: Mocking framework
‚Ä¢ AssertJ: Fluent assertions
‚Ä¢ TestDataBuilder: Test data creation

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Integration Test Tools
‚Ä¢ Spring Boot Test: Context loading
‚Ä¢ TestContainers: Database testing
‚Ä¢ WireMock: External service mocking
‚Ä¢ TestRestTemplate: HTTP testing

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
E2E Test Tools
‚Ä¢ Selenium: Browser automation
‚Ä¢ Cucumber: BDD scenarios
‚Ä¢ REST Assured: API testing
‚Ä¢ Allure: Test reporting

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Test Performance Standards

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Unit Test Performance
@TestPerformanceExtension
‚Ä¢ Execution time: < 50ms
‚Ä¢ Memory usage: < 5MB
‚Ä¢ Success rate: > 99%
‚Ä¢ No external dependencies

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Integration Test Performance
@TestPerformanceExtension
‚Ä¢ Execution time: < 500ms
‚Ä¢ Memory usage: < 50MB
‚Ä¢ Success rate: > 95%
‚Ä¢ Controlled dependencies

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
E2E Test Performance
@TestPerformanceExtension
‚Ä¢ Execution time: < 3s
‚Ä¢ Memory usage: < 500MB
‚Ä¢ Success rate: > 90%
‚Ä¢ Full system load

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: E2E Test Categories

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
User Journey Tests
SpringBootTest with RANDOM_PORT
‚Ä¢ Complete business flows
‚Ä¢ Multi-service interaction
‚Ä¢ Real database usage
‚Ä¢ Full Spring context

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Contract Tests
SpringBootTest annotation
‚Ä¢ API contract validation
‚Ä¢ Service interface testing
‚Ä¢ Backward compatibility
‚Ä¢ Consumer-driven contracts

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Smoke Tests
@SpringBootTest
‚Ä¢ Critical path validation
‚Ä¢ Deployment verification
‚Ä¢ Health check testing
‚Ä¢ Basic functionality

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Integration Test Categories

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Repository Tests
@DataJpaTest
‚Ä¢ Database query validation
‚Ä¢ Entity relationship testing
‚Ä¢ Custom query implementation
‚Ä¢ Transaction behavior

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Web Layer Tests
@WebMvcTest
‚Ä¢ Controller endpoint testing
‚Ä¢ Request/response validation
‚Ä¢ Security configuration
‚Ä¢ Error handling

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Spring Slice Tests
@JsonTest, @JdbcTest
‚Ä¢ Specific layer testing
‚Ä¢ Minimal context loading
‚Ä¢ Focused integration
‚Ä¢ Performance optimized

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Unit Test Categories

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Domain Tests
MockitoExtension
‚Ä¢ Aggregate root behavior
‚Ä¢ Value object validation
‚Ä¢ Domain service logic
‚Ä¢ Business rule enforcement

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Service Tests
MockitoExtension
‚Ä¢ Application service logic
‚Ä¢ Use case implementation
‚Ä¢ Mock external dependencies
‚Ä¢ Command/query handling

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Utility Tests
MockitoExtension
‚Ä¢ Helper method testing
‚Ä¢ Configuration validation
‚Ä¢ Mapper/converter logic
‚Ä¢ Algorithm implementation

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Test Pyramid Structure

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Unit Tests (80%)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Integration Tests (15%)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: E2E Tests (5%)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Unit Tests
üü¢ Fast, Cheap, Reliable
üü¢ Isolated components
üü¢ Business logic focus
üü¢ < 50ms execution, < 5MB memory

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
End-to-End Tests
üî∫ Slow, Expensive, Brittle
üî∫ Full system integration
üî∫ User journey validation
üî∫ < 3s execution, < 500MB memory

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Integration Tests
üî∂ Medium speed, Medium cost
üî∂ Component interaction
üî∂ Database integration
üî∂ < 500ms execution, < 50MB memory

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Unit Test Examples:
‚Ä¢ Domain logic validation
‚Ä¢ Business rule enforcement
‚Ä¢ Calculation accuracy
‚Ä¢ Value object behavior
‚Ä¢ Service method logic

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Integration Test Examples:
‚Ä¢ Repository database operations
‚Ä¢ REST API endpoint testing
‚Ä¢ Message queue integration
‚Ä¢ External service integration
‚Ä¢ Spring context loading

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
E2E Test Examples:
‚Ä¢ Complete order processing flow
‚Ä¢ User registration to first purchase
‚Ä¢ Payment processing end-to-end
‚Ä¢ Multi-service integration scenarios
‚Ä¢ Cross-browser compatibility
